settings.title: O'ahu, Hawai'i
settings.content: The Island of O'ahu in Hawaii is often nicknamed, or translated as 'The Gathering Place'. It's shoreline is 227 miles (365 km) long. Enjoy the best bits with Absorb Island's picks.

settings.credit: The Sunrise Shack | 2335 Kalakaua Ave, Honolulu, HI 96815, United States
settings.details:
The Sunrise Shack

Sunrise Shack isn’t just another roadside stand, it’s a beloved island institution. The bright yellow exterior makes it an unmissable outpost for locals and vacation-lovers alike who love to soak in the sunshine while sipping cooling tropical smoothies before another paddle out.

settings.title: Chickens are wild in O'ahu
settings.credit: O'ahu's wild chickens: colorful, free-roaming descendants of Polynesian settlers.

settings.content:
BEST LOCAL STREET FOOD

 Sunrise ShackThe shack was technically born in 2016 on a small plumeria farm in the heart of Oahu’s north shore, but the seed was planted in the hearts of the founders long before then.

settings.title: Hygienic and Ultra-Durable
settings.content: We deeply understand the importance of freshness and durability when it comes to drying off.  Our recycled yarns have built-in SILVADUR™ antimicrobial and anti-odor technology for advanced protection against bacteria that causes smelly towel syndrome.

settings.title: our model malia says
settings.content: “I love taking my hoodie to the beach, it’s perfect to throw on after a swim”
